verses.verse: James <WG2385> Of God <WG2316> And <WG2532> Of The Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> Bondman, <WG1401> To The <WG3588> Twelve <WG1427> Tribes <WG5443> Which Are <WG3588> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Dispersion, <WG1290> Greeting. <WG5463>
All <WG3956> Joy <WG5479> Esteem It, <WG2233> <WG80> My Brethren, <WG3450> When <WG3752> Temptations <WG3986> Ye May Fall Into <WG4045> Various, <WG4164>
Knowing <WG1097> That <WG3754> The <WG3588> Proving <WG1383> Of Your <WG5216> <WG3588> Faith <WG4102> Works Out <WG2716> Endurance. <WG5281>

<WG3588> <WG1161> But Endurance Its <WG5281> Work <WG2041> Perfect <WG5046> Let Have, <WG2192> That <WG2443> Ye May Be <WG5600> Perfect <WG5046> And <WG2532> Complete, <WG3648> In <WG1722> Nothing <WG3367> Lacking. <WG3007>

<WG1487> But If <WG1161> Anyone <WG5100> Of You <WG5216> Lack <WG3007> Wisdom, <WG4678> Let Him Ask <WG154> From <WG3844> Who <WG3588> Gives <WG1325> God <WG2316> To All <WG3956> Freely, <WG574> And <WG2532> <WG3361> Reproaches Not, <WG3679> And <WG2532> It Shall Be Given <WG1325> To Him : <WG846>

<WG154> But Let Him Ask <WG1161> In <WG1722> Faith, <WG4102> Nothing <WG3367> Doubting. <WG1252> <WG3588> For He That <WG1063> Doubts <WG1252> Is Like <WG1503> A Wave <WG2830> Of The Sea <WG2281> Being Driven By The Wind <WG416> And <WG2532> Being Tossed; <WG4494>
<WG3361> For Not <WG1063> Let Suppose <WG3633> <WG3588> <WG444> That Man <WG1565> That <WG3754> He Shall Receive <WG2983> Anything <WG5100> From <WG3844> The <WG3588> Lord; He Is <WG2962>
A Man <WG435> Double Minded, <WG1374> Unstable <WG182> In <WG1722> All <WG3956> <WG3588> <WG3598> His Ways. <WG846>
<WG2744> But Let Boast <WG1161> The <WG3588> Brother <WG80> Of <WG3588> Low Degree <WG5011> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG5311> His Elevation, <WG846>
<WG3588> And The <WG1161> Rich <WG4145> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG5014> His Humiliation, <WG846> Because <WG3754> As <WG5613> Flower <WG438> The Grass's <WG5528> He Will Pass Away. <WG3928>

<WG393> For Rose <WG1063> The <WG3588> Sun <WG2246> With Its <WG4862> <WG3588> Burning Heat, <WG2742> And <WG2532> Dried Up <WG3583> The <WG3588> Grass, <WG5528> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Flower <WG438> Of It <WG846> Fell, <WG1601> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Comeliness <WG2143> <WG3588> <WG4383> Of Its Appearance <WG846> Perished : <WG622> Thus <WG3779> Also <WG2532> The <WG3588> Rich <WG4145> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG4197> His Goings <WG846> Shall Wither. <WG3133>

Blessed Is The <WG3107> Man <WG435> Who <WG3739> Endures <WG5278> Temptation; <WG3986> Because <WG3754> Proved <WG1384> Having Been <WG1096> He Shall Receive <WG2983> The <WG3588> Crown <WG4735> <WG3588> Of Life, <WG2222> Which <WG3739> Promised <WG1861> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> To Those That <WG3588> Love <WG25> Him. <WG846>

No One <WG3367> Being Tempted <WG3985> Let Say, <WG3004> Because <WG3754> From <WG575> <WG3588> God <WG2316> I Am Tempted. <WG3985> <WG3588> <WG1063> For God <WG2316> Not To Be Tempted <WG551> Is <WG2076> By Evils, <WG2556> Tempts <WG3985> And <WG1161> Himself <WG846> No One. <WG3762>
<WG1538> But Each One <WG1161> Is Tempted, <WG3985> By <WG5259> Own <WG3588> His <WG2398> Lust <WG1939> Being Drawn Away <WG1828> And <WG2532> Being Allured; <WG1185>

Then <WG1534> <WG3588> Lust <WG1939> Having Conceived <WG4815> Gives Birth To <WG5088> Sin; <WG266> <WG3588> <WG1161> But Sin <WG266> Having Been Completed <WG658> Brings Forth <WG616> Death. <WG2288>
<WG3361> Be Not Mislead, <WG4105> Brethren <WG80> My <WG3450> Beloved. <WG27>

Every <WG3956> Act Of Giving <WG1394> Good <WG18> And <WG2532> Every <WG3956> Gift <WG1434> Perfect <WG5046> From Above <WG509> Is <WG2076> Coming Down <WG2597> From <WG575> The <WG3588> Father <WG3962> <WG3588> Of Lights, <WG5457> ' With <WG3844> Whom <WG3739> <WG3756> There Is Not <WG1762> Variation, <WG3883> Or <WG2228> Of Turning <WG5157> Shadow. <WG644>

Having Willed It <WG1014> He Begat <WG616> Us <WG2248> By The Word <WG3056> Of Truth, <WG225> For <WG1519> To <WG3588> Be <WG1511> Us <WG2248> First Fruits <WG536> A Sort Of <WG5100> <WG3588> <WG846> Of His Creatures. <WG2938>

So That, <WG5620> Brethren <WG80> My <WG3450> Beloved, <WG27> Let Be <WG2077> Every <WG3956> Man <WG444> <WG5036> Swift <WG1519> <WG3588> To Hear, <WG191> <WG1021> Slow <WG1519> <WG3588> To Speak, <WG2980> Slow <WG1021> To <WG1519> Wrath; <WG3709>
<WG3709> For Wrath <WG1063> Man's <WG435> Righteousness <WG1343> God's <WG2316> <WG3756> Works Not Out. <WG2716>

Wherefore, <WG1352> Having Laid Aside <WG659> All <WG3956> Filthiness <WG4507> And <WG2532> Abounding <WG4050> Of Wickedness, <WG2549> In <WG1722> Meekness <WG4240> Accept <WG1209> The <WG3588> Implanted <WG1721> Word, <WG3056> Which Is <WG3588> Able <WG1410> To Save <WG4982> <WG3588> <WG5590> Your Souls. <WG5216>
<WG1096> But Be Ye <WG1161> Doers <WG4163> Of The Word, <WG3056> And <WG2532> Not <WG3361> Only <WG3440> Hearers, <WG202> Beguiling <WG3884> Yourselves. <WG1438>

Because <WG3754> If <WG1487> Any Man <WG5100> A Hearer <WG202> Of The Word <WG3056> Is <WG2076> And <WG2532> Not <WG3756> A Doer, <WG4163> This One <WG3778> Is Like <WG1503> To A Man <WG435> Considering <WG2657> <WG3588> Face <WG4383> <WG3588> Natural <WG1078> His <WG846> In <WG1722> A Mirror : <WG2072>
<WG2657> For He Considered <WG1063> Himself <WG1438> And <WG2532> Has Gone Away, <WG565> And <WG2532> Immediately <WG2112> Forgot <WG1950> What Like <WG3697> He Was. <WG2258>

<WG3588> But He That <WG1161> Looked <WG3879> Into <WG1519> The Law <WG3551> Perfect, <WG5046> That <WG3588> <WG3588> Of Freedom, <WG1657> And <WG2532> Continued In It, <WG3887> This One <WG3778> Not <WG3756> A Hearer <WG202> Forgetful <WG1953> Having Been <WG1096> But <WG235> A Doer <WG4163> Of The Work <WG2041> This One <WG3778> Blessed <WG3107> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG4162> His Doing <WG846> Shall Be. <WG2071>

If <WG1487> Anyone <WG5100> Seems <WG1380> Religious <WG2357> To Be <WG1511> Among <WG1722> , You, <WG5213> Not <WG3361> Bridling <WG5468> <WG1100> His Tongue, <WG846> ' But <WG235> Deceiving <WG538> <WG2588> His Heart, <WG846> Of This One <WG5127> Vain <WG3152> Is The <WG3588> Religion. <WG2356>

Religion <WG2356> Pure <WG2513> And <WG2532> Undefiled <WG283> Before <WG3844> <WG3588> God <WG2316> And The <WG2532> Father <WG3962> This <WG3778> Is : <WG2076> To Visit <WG1980> Orphans <WG3737> And <WG2532> Widows <WG5503> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG2347> Their Tribulation, <WG846> Unspotted <WG784> Oneself <WG1438> To Keep <WG5083> From <WG575> The <WG3588> World. <WG2889>
